properties.name: project_id
properties.description: (Required/ForceNew) The project id where the app will be installed (string)

properties.name: target_namespace
properties.description: (Required/ForceNew) The namespace name where the app will be installed (string)

properties.name: template_name
properties.description: (Required) Template name of the app. If modified, app will be upgraded (string)

properties.name: answers
properties.description: (Optional) Answers for the app template. If modified, app will be upgraded (map)

properties.name: revision_id
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Current revision id for the app. If modified, If this argument is provided or modified, app will be rollbacked to revision_id (string)

properties.name: template_version
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Template version of the app. If modified, app will be upgraded. Default: latest (string)

properties.name: values_yaml
properties.description: (Optional) values.yaml base64 encoded file content for the app template. If modified, app will be upgraded (string)

properties.name: service_account_username
properties.description: (Required/Sensitive) Service account DN for access ActiveDirectory service (string)

properties.name: service_account_password
properties.description: (Required/Sensitive) Service account password for access ActiveDirectory service (string)

properties.name: access_mode
properties.description: (Optional) Access mode for auth. required, restricted, unrestricted are supported. Default unrestricted (string)

properties.name: allowed_principal_ids
properties.description: (Optional) Allowed principal ids for auth. Required if access_mode is required or restricted. Ex: activedirectory_user://<DN> activedirectory_group://<DN> (list)

properties.name: certificate
properties.description: (Optional/Sensitive) CA certificate for TLS if selfsigned (string)

properties.name: rancher_api_host
properties.description: (Required) Rancher url. Schema needs to be specified, https://<RANCHER_API_HOST> (string)

properties.name: access_mode
properties.description: (Optional) Access mode for auth. required, restricted, unrestricted are supported. Default unrestricted (string)

properties.name: allowed_principal_ids
properties.description: (Optional) Allowed principal ids for auth. Required if access_mode is required or restricted. Ex: adfs_user://<USER_ID> adfs_group://<GROUP_ID> (list)

properties.name: access_mode
properties.description: (Optional) Access mode for auth. required, restricted, unrestricted are supported. Default unrestricted (string)

properties.name: allowed_principal_ids
properties.description: (Optional) Allowed principal ids for auth. Required if access_mode is required or restricted. Ex: azuread_user://<USER_ID> azuread_group://<GROUP_ID> (list)

properties.name: service_account_distinguished_name
properties.description: (Required/Sensitive) Service account DN for access FreeIpa service (string)

properties.name: service_account_password
properties.description: (Required/Sensitive) Service account password for access FreeIpa service (string)

properties.name: access_mode
properties.description: (Optional) Access mode for auth. required, restricted, unrestricted are supported. Default unrestricted (string)

properties.name: allowed_principal_ids
properties.description: (Optional) Allowed principal ids for auth. Required if access_mode is required or restricted. Ex: freeipa_user://<DN> freeipa_group://<DN> (list)

properties.name: certificate
properties.description:
(Optional/Sensitive) Base64 encoded CA certificate for TLS if self-signed. Use filebase64(<file>) for encoding file (string)
</file>

properties.description: (Optional) Allowed principal ids for auth. Required if access_mode is required or restricted. Ex: github_user://<USER_ID> github_team://<GROUP_ID> github_org://<ORG_ID> (list)

properties.description: (Required) Rancher url. Schema needs to be specified, https://<RANCHER_API_HOST> (string)

properties.description: (Optional) Access mode for auth. required, restricted, unrestricted are supported. Default unrestricted (string)

properties.name: allowed_principal_ids

properties.description: (Required) Rancher url. Schema needs to be specified, https://<RANCHER_API_HOST> (string)

properties.description: (Optional) Access mode for auth. required, restricted, unrestricted are supported. Default unrestricted (string)

properties.name: allowed_principal_ids

properties.description: (Required/Sensitive) Service account DN for access OpenLdap service (string)

properties.name: service_account_password
properties.description: (Required/Sensitive) Service account password for access OpenLdap service (string)

properties.description: (Optional) Access mode for auth. required, restricted, unrestricted are supported. Default unrestricted (string)

properties.name: allowed_principal_ids
properties.description: (Optional) Allowed principal ids for auth. Required if access_mode is required or restricted. Ex: openldap_user://<DN> openldap_group://<DN> (list)

properties.name: rancher_api_host
properties.description: (Required) Rancher url. Schema needs to be specified, https://<RANCHER_API_HOST> (string)

properties.name: access_mode
properties.description: (Optional) Access mode for auth. required, restricted, unrestricted are supported. Default unrestricted (string)

properties.name: allowed_principal_ids
properties.description: (Optional) Allowed principal ids for auth. Required if access_mode is required or restricted. Ex: ping_user://<USER_ID> ping_group://<GROUP_ID> (list)

properties.name: current_password
properties.description: (Optional/computed/sensitive) Current password for Admin user. Just needed for recover if admin password has been changed from other resources and token is expired (string)

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional/computed/sensitive) Password for Admin user or random generated if empty (string)

properties.name: token_ttl
properties.description: (Optional) TTL in seconds for generated admin token. Default: 0 (int)

properties.name: url
properties.description: (Required) The url of the catalog repo (string)

properties.name: branch
properties.description: (Optional) The branch of the catalog repo to use. Default master (string)

properties.name: cluster_id
properties.description: (Optional/ForceNew) The cluster id of the catalog. Mandatory if scope = cluster (string)

properties.name: kind
properties.description: (Optional) The kind of the catalog. Just helm by the moment (string)

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional/Sensitive) The password to access the catalog if needed (string)

properties.name: project_id
properties.description: (Optional/ForceNew) The project id of the catalog. Mandatory if scope = project (string)

properties.name: scope
properties.description: (Optional) The scope of the catalog. cluster, global, and project are supported. Default global (string)

properties.name: username
properties.description: (Optional/Sensitive) The username to access the catalog if needed (string)

properties.name: project_id
properties.description: (Required/ForceNew) The project id where the certificate should be created  (string)

properties.name: namespace_id
properties.description: (Optional/ForceNew) The namespace id where the namespaced certificate should be created (string)

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the Cloud Credential (string)

properties.name: amazonec2_credential_config
properties.description: (Optional) AWS config for the Cloud Credential (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: azure_credential_config
properties.description: (Optional) Azure config for the Cloud Credential (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: digitalocean_credential_config
properties.description: (Optional) DigitalOcean config for the Cloud Credential (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: openstack_credential_config
properties.description: (Optional) OpenStack config for the Cloud Credential (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: vsphere_credential_config
properties.description: (Optional) vSphere config for the Cloud Credential (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: rke_config
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) The RKE configuration for rke Clusters. Conflicts with aks_config, eks_config and gke_config (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: aks_config
properties.description: (Optional) The Azure AKS configuration for aks Clusters. Conflicts with eks_config, gke_config and rke_config (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: eks_config
properties.description: (Optional) The Amazon EKS configuration for eks Clusters. Conflicts with aks_config, gke_config and rke_config (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: gke_config
properties.description: (Optional) The Google GKE configuration for gke Clusters. Conflicts with aks_config, eks_config and rke_config (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: cluster_auth_endpoint
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Enabling the local cluster authorized endpoint allows direct communication with the cluster, bypassing the Rancher API proxy. (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: cluster_monitoring_input
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Cluster monitoring config. Any parameter defined in rancher-monitoring charts could be configured (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: cluster_template_answers
properties.description: (Optional) Cluster template answers. Just for Rancher v2.3.x and above (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: cluster_template_id
properties.description: (Optional) Cluster template ID. Just for Rancher v2.3.x and above (string)

properties.name: cluster_template_questions
properties.description: (Optional) Cluster template questions. Just for Rancher v2.3.x and above (list)

properties.name: cluster_template_revision_id
properties.description: (Optional) Cluster template revision ID. Just for Rancher v2.3.x and above (string)

properties.name: desired_agent_image
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Desired agent image. Just for Rancher v2.3.x and above (string)

properties.name: desired_auth_image
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Desired auth image. Just for Rancher v2.3.x and above (string)

properties.name: docker_root_dir
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Desired auth image. Just for Rancher v2.3.x and above (string)

properties.name: enable_cluster_istio
properties.description: (Optional) Enable built-in cluster istio. Default false. Just for Rancher v2.3.x and above (bool)

properties.name: cluster_id
properties.description: (Required) The cluster id where create cluster alert group (string)

properties.name: group_interval_seconds
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert group interval seconds. Default: 180 (int)

properties.name: group_wait_seconds
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert group wait seconds. Default: 180 (int)

properties.name: repeat_interval_seconds
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert group wait seconds. Default: 3600 (int)

properties.name: cluster_id
properties.description: (Required) The cluster id where create cluster alert rule (string)

properties.name: group_id
properties.description: (Required) The cluster alert rule alert group ID (string)

properties.name: event_rule
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert rule event rule. ConflictsWith: "metric_rule", "node_rule", "system_service_rule"` (list Maxitems:1)

properties.name: group_interval_seconds
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert rule group interval seconds. Default: 180 (int)

properties.name: group_wait_seconds
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert rule group wait seconds. Default: 180 (int)

properties.name: inherited
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert rule inherited. Default: true (bool)

properties.name: metric_rule
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert rule metric rule. ConflictsWith: "event_rule", "node_rule", "system_service_rule"` (list Maxitems:1)

properties.name: node_rule
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert rule node rule. ConflictsWith: "event_rule", "metric_rule", "system_service_rule"` (list Maxitems:1)

properties.name: repeat_interval_seconds
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert rule wait seconds. Default: 3600 (int)

properties.name: severity
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert rule severity. Supported values : "critical" | "info" | "warning". Default: critical (string)

properties.name: system_service_rule
properties.description: (Optional) The cluster alert rule system service rule. ConflictsWith: "event_rule", "metric_rule", "node_rule"` (list Maxitems:1)

properties.name: builtin
properties.description: (Required) Specify whether the cluster driver is an internal cluster driver or not (bool)

properties.name: url
properties.description: (Required) The URL to download the machine driver binary for 64-bit Linux (string)

properties.name: actual_url
properties.description: (Optional) Actual url of the cluster driver (string)

properties.name: checksum
properties.description: (Optional) Verify that the downloaded driver matches the expected checksum (string)

properties.name: ui_url
properties.description: (Optional) The URL to load for customized Add Clusters screen for this driver (string)

properties.name: whitelist_domains
properties.description: (Optional) Domains to whitelist for the ui (list)

properties.name: cluster_id
properties.description: (Required) The cluster id to configure logging (string)

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the cluster logging config (string)

properties.name: kind
properties.description: (Required) The kind of the Cluster Logging. elasticsearch, fluentd, kafka, splunk and syslog are supported (string)

properties.name: elasticsearch_config
properties.description: (Optional) The elasticsearch config for Cluster Logging. For kind = elasticsearch. Conflicts with fluentd_config, kafka_config, splunk_config and syslog_config (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: fluentd_config
properties.description: (Optional) The fluentd config for Cluster Logging. For kind = fluentd. Conflicts with elasticsearch_config, kafka_config, splunk_config and syslog_config (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: kafka_config
properties.description: (Optional) The kafka config for Cluster Logging. For kind = kafka. Conflicts with elasticsearch_config, fluentd_config, splunk_config and syslog_config (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: namespace_id
properties.description: (Optional) The namespace id from cluster logging (string)

properties.name: output_flush_interval
properties.description: (Optional) How often buffered logs would be flushed. Default: 3 seconds (int)

properties.name: output_tags
properties.description: (Optional/computed) The output tags for Cluster Logging (map)

properties.name: splunk_config
properties.description: (Optional) The splunk config for Cluster Logging. For kind = splunk. Conflicts with elasticsearch_config, fluentd_config, kafka_config, and syslog_config (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: syslog_config
properties.description: (Optional) The syslog config for Cluster Logging. For kind = syslog. Conflicts with elasticsearch_config, fluentd_config, kafka_config, and splunk_config (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: cluster_id
properties.description: (Required) The cluster id where bind cluster role template binding (string)

properties.name: role_template_id
properties.description: (Required) The role template id from create cluster role template binding (string)

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the cluster role template binding (string)

properties.name: group_id
properties.description: (Optional) The group ID to assign cluster role template binding (string)

properties.name: group_principal_id
properties.description: (Optional) The group_principal ID to assign cluster role template binding (string)

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: (Optional) The user ID to assign cluster role template binding (string)

properties.name: user_principal_id
properties.description: (Optional) The user_principal ID to assign cluster role template binding (string)

properties.name: annotations
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Annotations for cluster role template binding (map)

properties.name: labels
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Labels for cluster role template binding (map)

properties.name: cluster_id
properties.description: (Required) Cluster ID to config Etcd Backup (string)

properties.name: backup_config
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Backup config for etcd backup (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: manual
properties.description: (Optional) Manual execution of the Etcd Backup. Default false (bool)

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the Etcd Backup (string)

properties.name: global_role_id
properties.description: (Required/ForceNew) The role id from create global role binding (string)

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: (Required/ForceNew) The user ID to assign global role binding (string)

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional/Computed/ForceNew) The name of the global role binding (string)

properties.name: catalog_name
properties.description: (Required) The multi cluster app catalog name (string)

properties.name: targets
properties.description: (Required) The multi cluster app target projects (list)

properties.name: template_name
properties.description: (Required) The multi cluster app template name (string)

properties.name: revision_history_limit
properties.description: (Computed) The multi cluster app revision history limit. Default 10 (int)

properties.name: revision_id
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Current revision id for the multi cluster app (string)

properties.name: template_version
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) The multi cluster app template version. Default: latest (string)

properties.name: upgrade_strategy
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) The multi cluster app upgrade strategy (list MaxItems:1)

properties.name: wait
properties.description: (Optional) Wait until the multi cluster app is active. Default true (bool)

properties.name: annotations
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Annotations for multi cluster app object (map)

properties.name: labels
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Labels for multi cluster app object (map)

properties.name: project_id
properties.description: (Required) The project id where assign namespace. It's on the form project_id=<cluster_id>:<id>. Updating <id> part on same <cluster_id> namespace will be moved between projects (string)

properties.name: container_resource_limit
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Default containers resource limits on namespace (List maxitem:1)

properties.name: resource_quota
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Resource quota for namespace. Rancher v2.1.x or higher (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: wait_for_cluster
properties.description: (Optional) Wait for cluster becomes active. Default false (bool)

properties.name: active
properties.description: (Required) Specify if the node driver state (bool)

properties.name: builtin
properties.description: (Required) Specify wheter the node driver is an internal node driver or not (bool)

properties.name: url
properties.description: (Required) The URL to download the machine driver binary for 64-bit Linux (string)

properties.name: checksum
properties.description: (Optional) Verify that the downloaded driver matches the expected checksum (string)

properties.name: ui_url
properties.description: (Optional) The URL to load for customized Add Nodes screen for this driver (string)

properties.name: whitelist_domains
properties.description: (Optional) Domains to whitelist for the ui (list)

properties.name: cluster_id
properties.description: (Required) The RKE cluster id to use Node Pool (string)

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the Node Pool (string)

properties.name: hostname_prefix
properties.description: (Required) The prefix for created nodes of the Node Pool (string)

properties.name: node_template_id
properties.description: (Required) The Node Template ID to use for node creation (string)

properties.name: control_plane
properties.description: (Optional) RKE control plane role for created nodes (bool)

properties.name: etcd
properties.description: (Optional) RKE etcd role for created nodes (bool)

properties.name: quantity
properties.description: (Optional) The number of nodes to create on Node Pool. Default 1. Only values >= 1 allowed (int)

properties.name: worker
properties.description: (Optional) RKE role role for created nodes (bool)

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the Node Template (string)

properties.name: amazonec2_config
properties.description: (Optional) AWS config for the Node Template (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: auth_certificate_authority
properties.description: (Optional/Sensitive) Auth certificate authority for the Node Template (string)

properties.name: auth_key
properties.description: (Optional/Sensitive) Auth key for the Node Template (string)

properties.name: azure_config
properties.description: (Optional) Azure config for the Node Template (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: cloud_credential_id
properties.description: (Optional) Cloud credential ID for the Node Template. Required from Rancher v2.2.x (string)

properties.name: digitalocean_config
properties.description: (Optional) Digitalocean config for the Node Template (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: engine_env
properties.description: (Optional) Engine environment for the node template (string)

properties.name: engine_insecure_registry
properties.description: (Optional) Insecure registry for the node template (list)

properties.name: engine_install_url
properties.description: (Optional) Docker engine install URL for the node template. Default https://releases.rancher.com/install-docker/18.09.sh. Available install docker versions at https://github.com/rancher/install-docker (string)

properties.name: engine_label
properties.description: (Optional) Engine label for the node template (string)

properties.name: engine_opt
properties.description: (Optional) Engine options for the node template (map)

properties.name: engine_registry_mirror
properties.description: (Optional) Engine registry mirror for the node template (list)

properties.name: engine_storage_driver
properties.description: (Optional) Engine storage driver for the node template (string)

properties.name: openstack_config
properties.description: (Optional) Openstack config for the Node Template (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: use_internal_ip_address
properties.description: (Optional) Engine storage driver for the node template (bool)

properties.name: vsphere_config
properties.description: (Optional) vSphere config for the Node Template (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: cluster_id
properties.description: (Required/ForceNew) The cluster id where create notifier (string)

properties.name: cluster_id
properties.description: (Required) The cluster id where create project (string)

properties.name: container_resource_limit
properties.description: (Optional) Default containers resource limits on project (List maxitem:1)

properties.name: pod_security_policy_template_id
properties.description: (Optional) Default Pod Security Policy ID for the project (string)

properties.name: project_monitoring_input
properties.description: (Optional/Computed) Project monitoring config. Any parameter defined in rancher-monitoring charts could be configured (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: resource_quota
properties.description: (Optional) Resource quota for project. Rancher v2.1.x or higher (list maxitems:1)

properties.name: wait_for_cluster
properties.description: (Optional) Wait for cluster becomes active. Default false (bool)

properties.description: (Optional) How often buffered logs would be flushed. Default: 3 seconds (int)

properties.description: (Optional) The syslog config for Project Logging. For kind = syslog. Conflicts with elasticsearch_config, fluentd_config, kafka_config, and splunk_config (list maxitems:1)
